column3: rick ross i'ma tell you like this nigga   rick ross i got a hundred gs on my line i ain't eatin' jacksons when i be in overtown bitch i'm eatin' lavish look up ho it's snowin' now i just throw the cabbage justice league gon' hold it down got a odor there in the attic that's a couple pounds new rolex that i ordered that's a hundred thou' time to milk the game bitch i went and bought a drug dealers live vicariously through me no bench time nickname starterdrake franchise player i don't even get a water break and these other lames is hardly mentioned i bet that with this pen i could
